frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description: Fires a long-range precision energy bolt. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
Speeds up charge.
  •  Faster charge time
  •  Decreases impact damage
perks.name: Accelerated Coils

perks.description:
Strong battery life.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Enhanced Battery

perks.description:
Large heavy battery.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Ionized Battery

perks.description:
Slower-building charge for higher damage.
  •  Increases impact damage
  •  Slower charge time
perks.name: Liquid Coils

perks.description:
Constrains recoil for every bolt.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Particle Repeater

perks.description:
Distance optimizations.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Projection Fuse

perks.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon increase accuracy and stability while improving vertical recoil.
perks.name: Heating Up

perks.description: Increases accuracy, stability, and precision hit targeting when firing from the hip.
perks.name: Hip-Fire Grip

perks.description: Reloading this weapon randomly overfills it from reserves.
perks.name: Clown Cartridge

perks.description: Rapidly landing precision hits will return one round to the magazine.
perks.name: Triple Tap

perks.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
perks.name: Auto-Loading Holster

perks.description: Grants increased reload speed when close to full magazine.
perks.name: Compulsive Reloader

perks.description: Precision final blows spawn a Stasis crystal at the victim's location.
perks.name: Headstone

perks.description: This weapon deals increased precision damage when near two or more allies.
perks.name: Firing Line

perks.description: After defeating a target, this weapon fires, charges, or draws more slowly and deals increased damage for a brief time.
perks.name: Adagio

perks.description: Increased damage against bosses, vehicles, and Guardians with their Super active.
perks.name: Vorpal Weapon

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for a short duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Dealing half of the magazine as precision damage grants this weapon bonus damage. The shot count is reset whenever the weapon is reloaded or stowed.
perks.name: Focused Fury

perks.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed.
perks.name: Successful Warm-Up
